```{r}

#|echo: false
library(reprex)
library(tidyverse)
library(httr2)
```

```{r}
#|warning: false
df0 <- 
  read_csv("Data/fourrure.csv") %>% 
  arrange(Date)

df0 %>% 
  select(Title, Date, Country, City, `Journal Type`, image_url) %>% 
  mutate(Title = str_c('<a href="', image_url, '">', Title, '</a>'),
         image_url = str_c('<img src="', image_url, '">')) %>% 
  rowid_to_column("ID") %>% 
  DT::datatable(escape = FALSE, filter = 'top', options = list(
  pageLength = 10, autoWidth = TRUE
))
```
